display_html: mkDummyHash ∷ ∀ h a. HashAlgorithm h ⇒ Proxy h → Int → Hash h a
name: mkDummyHash

display_html: type CanMock era = (Era era, Mock (Crypto era))
name: CanMock

display_html:
data SomeResult blk where
  • SomeResult ∷ ∀ blk result. (Eq result, Show result, Typeable result) ⇒ Query blk result → result → SomeResult blk
name: SomeResult SomeResult

display_html:
data CoreNode era = CoreNode {
  • cnGenesisKey ∷ !(SignKeyDSIGN era)
  • cnDelegateKey ∷ !(SignKeyDSIGN era)
  • cnStakingKey ∷ !(SignKeyDSIGN era)
  • cnVRF ∷ !(SignKeyVRF era)
  • cnKES ∷ !(SignKeyKES era)
  • cnOCert ∷ !(OCert era)
}
name: CoreNode CoreNode cnGenesisKey cnDelegateKey cnStakingKey cnVRF cnKES cnOCert

display_html:
data CoreNodeKeyInfo era = CoreNodeKeyInfo {
  • cnkiKeyPair ∷ (KeyPair Payment era, KeyPair Staking era)
  • cnkiCoreNode ∷ (KeyPair Genesis era, AllIssuerKeys era GenesisDelegate)
}
name: CoreNodeKeyInfo CoreNodeKeyInfo cnkiKeyPair cnkiCoreNode

name: mkKesConfig

name: mkProtocolRealTPraos

display_html: mkVerKey ∷ TPraosCrypto era ⇒ SignKeyDSIGN era → VKey r era

data ShelleyTxGenExtra h = ShelleyTxGenExtra {
  • stgeGenEnv ∷ GenEnv (MockShelley h)
  • stgeStartAt ∷ SlotNo
}
name: ShelleyTxGenExtra ShelleyTxGenExtra stgeGenEnv stgeStartAt

display_html: genTx ∷ ∀ h. HashAlgorithm h ⇒ TopLevelConfig (ShelleyBlock (MockShelley h)) → SlotNo → TickedLedgerState (ShelleyBlock (MockShelley h)) → GenEnv (MockShelley h) → Gen (Maybe (GenTx (ShelleyBlock (MockShelley h))))
name: genTx
